required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 18, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Safety and Immunogenicity Study of Inactivated SARS-CoV-2 Vaccine (Vero Cells) in Healthy Population Aged 18 Years and Above(COVID-19)
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Safety and Immunogenicity of Inactivated SARS-CoV-2 Vaccine (Vero Cells) in Healthy Population Aged 18 Years and Above: a Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo Parallel-controlled Phase I Clinical Trial

collaborator.agency: Shenzhen Kangtai Biological Products Co., LTD
Jiangsu Province Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a randomized, double-blinded, and placebo controlled phase Ⅰ clinical trial of the SARS-CoV-2 inactivated vaccine to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of the experimental vaccine in healthy adults ⩾18 years.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: 0-28 days after each dose of vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of abnormal indicators of laboratory safety examinations(including blood routine, blood biochemistry, urine routine and coagulation function)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 3 after each dose of vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: The seropositive rates of SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 and day 28 after each dose of vaccination, and 3, 6 and 12 months post full vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: The seropositive level of SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 and day 28 after each dose of vaccination, and 3, 6 and 12 months post full vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: The seropositive rates of SARS-CoV-2 IgG antibody(tested by ELISA)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 and day 28 after each dose of vaccination, and 3, 6 and 12 months post full vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: The seropositive level of SARS-CoV-2 IgG antibody(tested by ELISA)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 and day 28 after each dose of vaccination, and 3, 6 and 12 months post full vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: The proportion of IFN-γ positive cells (by ELISpot)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before second and third vaccination, day 28 post full vaccination(18~59years, 3 doses group); before second vaccination and day 14 post full vaccination(18~59years, 2 doses group); 3, 6 and 12 months post full vaccination(18~59years, both group）

Before second and third vaccination, day 28 post full vaccination(18~59years, 3 doses group); before second vaccination and day 14 post full vaccination(18~59years, 2 doses group); 3, 6 and 12 months post full vaccination(18~59years, both group）

other_outcome.measure: The SARS-CoV-2 antibody level of IgG1, IgG2, IgG3, IgG4 and Nucleoprotein
other_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 and 28 after each dose, and 3, 6, 12 months post full vaccination(18~59years)

arm_group.description: Two doses of medium dosage inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine on the schedule of day 0,14
Two doses of high dosage inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine on the schedule of day 0,14
Two doses of placebo on the schedule of day 0,14
Three doses of medium dosage inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine on the schedule of day 0,28,56
Three doses of high dosage inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine on the schedule of day 0,28,56
Three doses of placebo on the schedule of day 0,28,56
Three doses of medium dosage inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine on the schedule of day 0,28,56
Three doses of high dosage inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine on the schedule of day 0,28,56
Three doses of placebo on the schedule of day 0,28,56

facility.name: Jiangsu Provincial Center for Diseases Control and Prevention
